flavour: Who would believe fel magic could hide behind such a face?

name: Elendril
rules: 1, Flip Elendril -> Your Ranged weapons have +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Elendril is most at home in the wilderness with only his tiger at his side.

name: Gorebelly
rules: 1, Flip Gorebelly -> You pay 3 less the next time you strike with a Melee weapon this turn.
flavour: Master of weapons. Devoid of mercy.

name: Graccus
rules: 3, Flip Graccus -> Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: The greatest battles are won not by strength of arm, but strength of will.

name: Grennan Stormspeaker
rules: 5, Flip Grennan Stormspeaker -> Grennan deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The sky itself trembles at his call.

name: Kayleitha
rules: 2, Flip Kayleitha -> While Kayleitha is tealthed, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
flavour: For some, darkness is a source of fear. For others, darkness is all they know.

name: Litori Frostburn
rules: 2, Flip Litori Frostburn -> Target hero or ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Her touch is as cold as her heart.

name: Moonshadow
rules: 3, Flip Moonshadow -> Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
flavour: Life, death, rebirth: all of nature is a cycle.

name: Omedus the Punisher
rules: 3, Flip Omedus -> Omedus deals shadow damage to target hero equal to 7 minus the number of cards in its controller's hand.
flavour: In life, Omedus was a handsome scholar. The plague was not kind to him.

name: Radak Doombringer
rules: X, Flip Radak Doombringer, destroy one of your Pets with cost X -> Radak deals X shadow damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Azeroth's darkest places offer great rewards to those willing to traverse them.

name: Sen'zir Beastwalker
rules: 3, Flip Sen'zir Beastwalker -> Put a Pet card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Vicious and cunning; like hunter, like pet.

name: Ta'zo
rules: 3, Flip Ta'zo -> Ta'zo deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: You play wit da fire, mon, you gonna get da burn!

name: Thangal
rules: 3, Flip Thangal -> Ready Thangal. Use only while he's in bear form.
flavour: The most powerful druids know their greatest strength lies in versatility.

name: Timmo Shadestep
rules: 5, Flip Timmo Shadestep -> Destroy target exhausted ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The ability to hide in half a shadow makes gnomes among Azeroth's deadliest assassins.

name: Warrax
rules: 1, Flip Warrax -> Warrax has Protector this turn.
flavour: So long as I stand, you shall not pass.

name: A Donation of Wool
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavour: Wonderful! We thank you for your generous donation! — Clavicus Knavingham

name: Are We There, Yeti?
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put three Mechanical Yeti ally tokens with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.
flavour: Now, I sent some mail to my friends already, telling them that I have a surprise for them. This is where you come in! -Umi Rumplesnicker

name: Battle of Darrowshire
rules: Remove three ally cards in your graveyard from the game and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: No man, woman, or child survived to tell the tale.

name: Big Game Hunter
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Killing for survival is savage. Killing for sport is civilized.

name: Blueleaf Tubers
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me.

name: Chasing A-Me 01
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: A-Me good. Home. Find home.

name: Counterattack!
rules: While there are more allies in an opponent's party than in yours, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: Face the Kolkar invaders, and end their threat in the Barrens. Kill them until their leader, Warlord Krom'zar, appears. Defeat him and bring me a piece of his banner as proof. - Regthar Deathgate

name: Dragonkin Menace
rules: During an opponent's turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Ready a hero or ally in your party.
flavour: Succeed, and perhaps we can talk of other things. - Helendis Riverhorn

name: For the Horde!
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Horde allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking this turn.
flavour: Be bathed in my power! Drink in my might! Battle for the golry of the Horde! - Warchief Thrall

name: In Dreams
rules: Pay 8 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.
flavour: I want not to dream anymore. - Taelan Fordring

name: Into the Maw of Madness
rules: Destroy Into the Maw of Madness to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: I need you to venture into Hive Regal and find what became of my dearest Natalia - Commander Mar'alith

name: It's a Secret to Everybody
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.
flavour: Some secrets are best hidden in plain sight.

name: Kibler's Exotic Pets
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Sunken Treasure
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target equipment card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Can I trust you to deliver this message safely and in confidence? - Fleet Master Seahorn

name: The Defias Brotherhood
rules: While there are four or more allies in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: There is but one task left for you to complete. Edwin VanCleef must be assassinated. — Gryan Stoutmantle

name: The Love Potion
rules: Exhaust two allies in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Oh, the pains of love! — Mistress Nagmara

name: The Missing Diplomat
rules: During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Search your deck for an ally card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: Bishop DeLavey asked me to approach adventurers who might be able to help him with a delicate matter. — Thomas

name: The Princess Trapped
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: That's no princess.

name: Tooga's Quest
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a unique Turtle ally token named Tooga with 1 ATK and 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove Tooga from the game. If you do, draw two cards.
flavour: So he couldn't find his way back on his own? Figures. -Torta

name: Torek's Assault
rules: If an opposing hero was dealt damage this turn by an ally in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: What do you say? Are you with us? - Torek

name: Your Fortune Awaits You
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Fortune favors the bold.

name: Zapped Giants
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put revealed ability card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I'm going to have to do something about the giants if I stay out here! - Zorbin Fandazzle

name: Shadow Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.;When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you. - Radak Doombringer

name: Saltwater Snapjaw
rules: 3 -> Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Saltwater Snapjaw this turn.
flavour: Many sought a mount that would bring its own armor to war. Landro delivered.

name: Rise to the Challenge
rules: Attach to your hero and remove all damage from it.; Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.; Ongoing: Your hero has +10 health.

name: Rak Skyfury
rules: When Rak Skyfury enters play, ready your hero and one of your weapons.

name: Polymorph
rules: Attach to target ally.; Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a sheep.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Baaaaa.

name: Mezzik Darkspark
rules: [Exhaust], Destroy an ally in your party -> Mezzik Darkspark deals X shadow damage to target hero or ally, where X is the ATK of the destroyed ally.

name: Medoc Spiritwarden
rules: [Exhaust] -> Put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: We pray for the strength to fight once more, for our brothers and for our home.

name: Lt. Commander Dudefella
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Dudefella deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
flavour: It's rare that I don't spend a night killing Horde. They're filthy animals.

name: Life Tap
rules: As an additional cost to play Life Tap, put 2 damage on your hero.; Draw two cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: When the dark arts cal for flesh, you can only trust your own.

name: Latro Abiectus
rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: I am morally certain you have made a critical error in judgment, orc.

name: Landro Longshot
rules: 1, [Exhaust], Discard a card -> Flip a coin. If you win the flip, draw two cards. If you lose the flip, you may pay 2 to reflip.
flavour: There are rumors - some sinister, some benign - that Landro's influence extends far beyond the arena of gambling.

name: Krol Blade
flavour: The blade's keen edge always fetches a high price at the auction house.

name: Kulan Earthguard
rules: Protector; At the end of your turn, ready Kulan Earthguard.

name: King Magni Bronzebeard
rules: At the end of each turn, put an Alliance Dwarf Warrior ally token with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.;Dwarves in your party have Protector.
flavour: How can the dwarves help you?

name: Kibler's Exotic Pets
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: It's a Secret to Everybody
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.
flavour: Some secrets are best hidden in plain sight.

name: Into the Maw of Madness
rules: Destroy Into the Maw of Madness to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: I need you to venture into Hive Regal and find what became of my dearest Natalia - Commander Mar'alith

name: Innervate
rules: Target player draws three cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: Energy surged through her body like a raging river.

name: Infernal
rules: At the start of your turn, discard a card, or target opponent gains control of Infernal.; At the end of your turn, Infernal deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: The master of every infernal worries not about its death, but that it might survive too long.

name: Frost Shock
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: There is only one kind of cold the dwarves of Dun Morogh fear.

name: Elder Moorf
rules: 1 -> Target ally has +2 ATK this turn. Use only once per turn.
flavour: May the eternal sun shine upon thee.

name: Draconian Deflector
rules: Your hero has Protector.

name: Divine Shield
rules: Destroy any number of abilities attached to your hero.; Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.; Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

name: Deadly Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

name: Counterattack!
rules: While there are more allies in an opponent's party than in yours, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: Face the Kolkar invaders, and end their threat in the Barrens. Kill them until their leader, Warlord Krom'zar, appears. Defeat him and bring me a piece of his banner as proof. - Regthar Deathgate

name: Cleave
rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to each of up to two target allies, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
flavour: Two bodies are better than one.

name: Chasing A-Me 01
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: A-Me good. Home. Find home.

name: Bloodclaw
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The eyes of a raptor reveal a feral, vicious intelligence at work.

name: Big Game Hunter
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Killing for survival is savage. Killing for sport is civilized.

name: Backstab
rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally, where X is 3 plus the ATK of one of your Daggers.
flavour: In the war between the Horde and the Alliance, grudges are taken to the hilt.

name: Are We There, Yeti?
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put three Mechanical Yeti ally tokens with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.
flavour: Now, I sent some mail to my friends already, telling them that I have a surprise for them. This is where you come in! -Umi Rumplesnicker

name: Arcanite Reaper
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The arcanite reaper was long the mark of a true warrior in Azeroth. Having one crafted was like a rite of passage.

name: Apprentice Teep
rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive

name: Aimed Shot
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required; Your hero deals X ranged damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: One shot. One kill.

name: Spirit Healer
rules: Ongoing: At the end of each player's turn, that player may put an ally card from his graveyard into play with damage on it equal to its health minus 1.
flavour: It is not yet your time. I shall aid your journey back to the realm of the living.

name: Taz'dingo
rules: When Taz'Dingo enters play, he deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Tewa Wildmane
rules: Tewa Wildmane has +1 ATK and +1 health for each face-down resource you have.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
rules: While there are four or more allies in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: There is but one task left for you to complete. Edwin VanCleef must be assassinated. — Gryan Stoutmantle

name: The Princess Trapped
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: That's no princess.

name: Thunderhead Hippogryph
rules: [Alliance]: Thunderhead Hippogryph has Elusive.;[Horde]: Thunderhead Hippogryph has Ferocity.
flavour: The Black Flame were among the first to gain the aid of the mighty hippogryphs in battle.

name: Torek's Assault
rules: If an opposing hero was dealt damage this turn by an ally in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: What do you say? Are you with us? - Torek

name: Warchief Thrall
rules: Other Horde allies in your party have +3 ATK and +3 health.
flavour: Lok'Tar, friend. Have you come to serve the Horde?

name: Windseer Tarus
rules: When Windseer Tarus attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready him.

name: Wyneth Harridan
rules: Protector; 3, [Exhaust] -> Destroy target Undead ally.
flavour: As the Light shines, so shall we.

name: Zygore Bladebreaker
rules: When Zygore Bladebreaker enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
